meanings.sent1: The group of dolts couldn't solve the simple puzzle.
meanings.sent2: The dolts in the class always made silly mistakes.
meanings.sent3: The dolts thought the moon was made of cheese!
meanings.sent4: He felt like he was surrounded by dolts in a sea of intelligence.
meanings.sent5: The image of the dolts tripping over each other stuck in his mind.

meanings.definition: To act in a stupid manner
meanings.sent1: Please don't dolts around and focus on your work.
meanings.sent2: They doltsed their way through the project and it turned out a mess.
meanings.sent3: The kids decided to dolts by pretending to be robots.
meanings.sent4: She felt like she was doltsing through life without a care.
meanings.sent5: The comedian doltsed around on stage, making everyone laugh.
